Class BTOperation<OwnerType extends SupportOperations,ResultType>

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.common.AbstractOperation<OwnerType,ResultType>
      de.tud.kom.p2psim.overlay.bt.operation.BTOperation<OwnerType,ResultType>
Type Parameters:
OwnerType - the class of the component that owns this operation
ResultType - the class of the result of this operation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operation<ResultType>, SimulationEventHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BTOperationChoking, BTOperationDistribute, BTOperationDownload, BTOperationKeepAlive, BTOperationPeerStarter, BTOperationSendStatistic, BTOperationUnchokingNum, BTOperationUpload, BTOperationValueLookup
public abstract class BTOperation<OwnerType extends SupportOperations,ResultType>
extends AbstractOperation<OwnerType,ResultType>

The abstract super class of all BitTorrent Operations.

Author:
Jan Stolzenburg

stop

public void stop(boolean success)
Abort the operation. This is very usefull for operations that get executed regularly.

Parameters:
success - Was the operation successfull?
